MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G44 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:05pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network located on Curtis Avenue and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:50pm on Saturday, 20 February 2021
